mapper.insert: insert into users(num, ucode, id, pw, name, gender, email, birth, postcode, address1, address2, address3, address4, contact, regdate, status) values(userseq.nextval, #{ucode}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, to_date(#{birth}), #{postcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{address4}, #{contact}, sysdate, #{status})
mapper.select: select id from users where id = #{id}
select email from users where email = #{email}
select id from users where name = #{name} and email = #{email}
select pw from users where id = #{id} and email = #{email}
select * from users where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update users set status = '탈퇴보류중' where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
update users set pw = #{pw} where id = #{id}
